Summary: two red and orange craft. over the sound in westbrook off the beach about 300-500 ft very strange.was thinking a plane til it changed direction and was allowed by a second ever closer and more amazing.WOW
divs: Sighting DetailsIT WAS AMAZING,I stepped on to the beach with girl friend and dog for a walk and looked up and seen one of them then a second, red and orange glowing light, amazing, she did not want to talk about it at first want to think a bit about it first....amazing
trends: There has been one other sighting in Westbrook
There were no other sightings in Westbrook on or around July 7th 2012
